About
Hello!
I'm Zuo Zizhen.

Now I'm a freelancer in Beijing. I'm good at integrating my skills together to create more power, such as design, code and inspiration from different areas of design, I like the process of creation.

I think a great product needs to be best in all aspects. In the process, the collaboration and coordination of various links, such as design and code, are needed. My advantage is to have compound skills. In the process of design, we can fully consider the feasibility of development, and control the design quality from the aspects of products and interaction.My inspiration comes from architecture and nature.
